information: The maximum number of points is 200. Those are the cross-code-review and cross-check criterias:

criteria.text: RTK query is used for api calls
Selected items are managed through the redux store, selected items are persistent across pages
Flyout component is showed/hidden based on the presence of selected items, displays the number of selected items
"Unselect all" button and "Download" button work according to the requirements
User can switch the theme of the application
Direct DOM manipulations inside the React components
Presence of code-smells (God-object, chunks of duplicate code), commented code sections
Usage of component libraries, e.g. Material UI, Ant Design
Pull Request doesn't follow guideline (including checkboxes in Score)
